name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 122
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, The Prince Has No Clothes. This week Prince Andrew was stripped of all his military titles and designate “His Royal Highness.” Andrew will now face sexual abuse charges as a civilian in a  NY court of law. Andrew, who was frequently closely tied with now deceased sex trafficker and predator Jefferey Epstein, is accused of raping Virginia Giuffre while she was a teenager. With the recent guilty verdict of Ghislaine Maxwell, Prince Andrew’s house of cards seems to be quickly falling. Hopefully this is only the beginning of the rich and powerful being held accountable for the heinous acts they participated in with the help of Epstein and Maxwell.
